DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate safety immunogenicity three different concentration TBE vaccine investigate healthy child age 6 16 year .
DOC.brief_title: Dose-finding Study Investigate Safety Immunogenicity Two Vaccinations With FSME IMMUN NEW Healthy Volunteers Aged 6 16 Years .
DOC.criteria: Male female child eligible participation study : 6 year ( 6th birthday ) 16 year old ( last day 16th birthday ) ; clinically healthy ; legal representative old 8 year volunteer understand nature study , agree provision give write informed consent ; legal representative agree keep Volunteer Diary . For safety reason female volunteer capable bear child fulfill follow inclusion criterion study start : negative pregnancy test study start ; agree employ adequate birth control measure duration study . Children exclude participation study : history previous TBE vaccination ; history TBE infection show evidence latent TBE infection ( demonstrated screening ELISA > 126 VIEU/ml / neutralization test > 1:10 ) ; history allergic reaction , particular one component vaccine ; receive antipyretic within 4 hour prior first TBE vaccination ; suffer disease effectively treat stabilize ; suffer disease ( e.g . autoimmune disease ) undergo form treatment expect influence immunological function ; suffer chronic , degenerative / inflammatory disease central nervous system ; know HIV positive ( special HIV test require purpose study ) ; suffer febrile illness study entry ; history vaccination yellow fever / Japanese Bencephalitis ; participate simultaneously another clinical trial . female , pregnant breast feed Volunteers meet inclusion / exclusion criterion , febrile illness ( body temperature > = 38Â° C , measure orally ) schedule time vaccination , vaccinate body temperature return normal .
